attributes.action: Support Nigeria's Doctors to fight Ebola
attributes.additional_details:
Ebola has entered Nigeria, Africa's most populous country. On Wednesday Nigeria's president signed a directive to sack most middle grade doctors in Federal Hospitals, the very people you would need to control Ebola if it flares up. If Ebola takes hold in Nigeria, the UK would not be spared.

Help sign petition for DFID to use its influence to help get Nigeria's doctors back to work, to help in the negotiations to call off the doctors strike
